channel.title: Client crashes
channel.description:
okay so me and my friend tried opening server and all Server worked for me in Windows XP , he was hosting in Windows 7 X64 and im XP x86 worked for me 100% perfect just for him it crashes when he moves around like he press 1 time to move the another one crashes his client... Can someone help us? we using creativescape source+client
Thanks.

item.title: Client crashes
item.dc:creator: @Project_Realm Project Realm
item.description:
@Project_Realm wrote:

Notice that you have a 32 bit Windows XP system, and he has a 64 bit Windows 7 system. The problem is that he has a 64 bit system. You should search Google or Mopar for ways to run a server on a 64 bit computer. I found this video from a Google search, but I didn’t check if it works. You should try it anyway.

Read full topic
